member.name: ITfTextEditSink.OnEndEdit
member.summary: Receives a notification upon completion of an ITfEditSession.DoEditSession method that has read/write access to the context.
member.param: Pointer to the interface for the edited context.
Specifies a TfEditCookie value for read-only access to the context.
Pointer to the interface used to access the modifications to the context.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfTextEditSink
member.summary: The ITfTextEditSink interface supports completion of an edit session that involves read/write access. Install this advise sink by calling with IID_ITfTextEditSink. A text service or application can optionally implement this interface.
